name: Piggy Chapter 1
description:
Piggy kidnapped you!

Therefore, you will have to escape from the house by solving puzzles and using objects to get out of that place.

Average playtime: 20 - 30 minutes

Characteristics:

Explore a house.

Find objects and solve puzzles.

escape from pig

leave the house
